title: Unmei no Tsugai ga Omae da Nante
original_name: 運命の番がお前だなんて
sinopse:
Shishikura (Omega) is in the process of finding his fateful turn. He suddenly gets a heat and has a relationship with his nemesis, Toraya (Alpha), who joined the company halfway through. The next morning, the person who was sent to Shishikura from the luck counseling office as "the best match" was...!? The worst personality, the best and highest fate of Ken Couple Omega Bath!

(Source: Shinshokan, translated)
